Gather.Say: If you are experiencing a medical emergency, please hang up the phone and call 9 1 1.
Please enter a number corresponding to your gender. 1 for female, 2 for male, 3 for other.
At the tone, please describe your medical needs.
Please enter the urgency of your medical needs on a scale of one to five.
Please enter the date of your availability in 6 digits.
For example, January first of twenty fifteen would be 0 1 0 1 1 5.
Thank you, a doctor will contact you as soon as possible.
